name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: I'm an Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building scalable backend systems and AI-powered developer tools.
Over 13 years, I've shipped 439+ repos with 1.8K+ stars, writing mostly in Go and TypeScript. I focus on backend infrastructure, real-time systems, and AI agent tooling.

My approach: depth in backend/AI tooling, breadth in product iteration. I built vue-loading-spinner (688⭐), jira-mcp (80⭐ Go MCP server), and multiple MCP integrations. Recently forked CodeWiki to add Go language support.
On the side, I run aiocean.io, exploring MCP plugins and AI agent ecosystems. I write about engineering and product thinking at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus.
Back in 2016, I co-founded Vue.js Vietnam community, helping developers adopt Vue.js across the region.
I care about tools that make developers faster and systems that scale cleanly. Currently experimenting with investment analytics and AI-enhanced workflows.

projects.title: Frontend Context
projects.description: Enrich frontend context for better AI responses

now: Forked and enhancing CodeWiki with Go language support
